DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluates the use of single agent ublituximab, a novel monoclonal antibody, in patients with relapsing forms of multiple sclerosis
DOC.brief_title: Phase 2 Study of Ublituximab in Patients With Relapsing Forms of Multiple Sclerosis
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of relapsed multiple sclerosis Active disease Greater than 1 relapse in prior 2 years Treatment with antiCD20 monoclonal antibody within the last 12 months Treatment with alemtuzumab within the last 12 months Pregnant or nursing mothers
